content: The Blade Monk fights like all other enemies of his kind with a massive sword. This sword hits hard, but the plus side is that it appears to be extremely heavy. Dodge each hit of the Blade Monk's combo and take the opportunity to land your own while he's recovering and gearing up for the next one.
promot:
This excerpt is taken from the file "Blade_Monk_Spirit.md", within the section "Blade Monk Spirit" and the sub-section "Blade Monk Fight". The content is presented below:

The Blade Monk fights like all other enemies of his kind with a massive sword. This sword hits hard, but the plus side is that it appears to be extremely heavy. Dodge each hit of the Blade Monk's combo and take the opportunity to land your own while he's recovering and gearing up for the next one.
